Jersey City
===========

Jake Ephros, Ward D
-------------------

[City of Jersey City](https://www.jerseycitynj.gov/)
[City Hall](https://www.jerseycitynj.gov/cityhall/)
[City Council](https://www.jerseycitynj.gov/cityhall/CityCouncil/)

Jake Ephros, Ward D

* [City Council](https://www.jerseycitynj.gov/cityhall/CityCouncil/)
* [Jake Ephros, Ward D](https://www.jerseycitynj.gov/cityhall/CityCouncil/jake_ephros__ward_d/)

Contact Info
------------

* phone

  (201) 547-5485
* 280 Grove Street
  Room 207
  Jersey City, NJ 07302

| --- | --- |
| ![Generic Person](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_6189660/Image/City%20Hall/City%20Council/2026%20Council/President/Generic%20Person_USE%20AdobeStock_227477072.png "Generic Person") | Ward D Councilperson Jake Ephros **Term of Office:   First Elected To Council: Dec. 2, 2025   Current Term Expires: January 14, 2030**  **201) 547-5485   [JEphros@jcnj.org](mailto:JEphros@jcnj.org)     Council Aide: Bingjiefu He   (201) 547-6817** |

Jake Ephros is a proud teacher at Saint Peter's University, a former union organizer, and a democratic socialist in Jersey City Heights. A longtime activist, Jake led Jersey City’s Right To Counsel campaign, which won guaranteed legal representation for tenants in housing court. He fought alongside union nurses and nursing home workers with 1199SEIU to win better contracts and has been active in immigration justice work in Hudson County. Jake is proud to have earned the trust and support of thousands of Ward D residents and is thrilled to begin representing our community on City Council.

![Jersey City](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_6189660/Image/logo/white-logo.png)

Jersey City, New Jersey

Jersey City NJ 07302

201-547-5000
